transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji namaskar.

Customer: Ji sir, namaskar.

Customer: Ah, mam mere sath IndiaMART ke through matlab ek vyakti ne mujhe call kiya IndiaMART pe usne bataya hai. Aur IndiaMART me wo vyakti register bhi hai aur mere sath usne material matlab rupaye dilwaye aur rupaye dilwane ke baad usne payment na to payment wapis kar raha hai.
Customer: Na material mujhe pahuchaya tha.

Executive: Aditya aap baat kar rahe ho?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aditya ye sir kaun sa number aaya hai ye aapka?

Customer: Malum nahi hai mujhe.

Executive: Kisi bhuke number se call aa rahi thi pata nahi.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Haan mujhe bataiye.

Customer: Ah, ji suniye mam.

Executive: Haan haan mujhe bataiye.

Customer: Mam ispe Aditya ji se bhi baat hui hai aur unhone kaha hai ki aap ek baar toll free number pe call karke aur email se aap apni email id se ek baar uspe complaint apni darj karaiye.

Executive: Hmm.

Executive: To aap ek baar mail kar do apni side se hai na?

Customer: Ji mam.

Executive: Haan aap ek baar mujhe mail karo aur aapne mujhe is number pe kyun call kiya hai aapko maine aapko kal bhi bola tha ki Aditya ye process meri lambi ho jayega. Jaisa same maine kal kiya tha na sham me?

Customer: Ji ji. Hello. Haan.

Executive: Ji mam.

Executive: Ji haan mere ko fir se dobara wahi kaam karna padega aage forward karna padega update karke. To aapke paas fir se ek wo aayegi gmail par ek wo aap bol rahi thi na kal ki aaya nahi tha feedback ke liye.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Haan to abhi usme mai dekhti hu ki aa jayega aur but ye mujhe samajh nahi aa raha.

Executive: Par hai na? Pata nahi kaise id se dikha raha hai ye mujhe aapka. Chaliye koi baat nahi haan.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan mujhe baat bataiye.

Customer: Ji bataiye mam. Ah, keh rahe the apni taraf se. Aap jo bol rahe ho na ki IndiaMART aap bol rahe ho na ki kisi IndiaMART ke vyakti ke through hi payment wagera hui hai.

Executive: Ji ji.

Executive: Ji ji. Haan.

Executive: Haan bataiye aap.

Customer: To unhe wo unka koi detail koi number kuch hai aapke paas?

Customer: Wahi mam maine share kiya hua hai wahi hai.

Executive: Achha jo number aapne mujhe share kiya hai ye koi IndiaMART ka hi person hai jiske through aapki usse dealing hui hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aur ye abhi is number pe wo call utha ke kuch bol raha hai aapko?

Customer: Aap wahi baat karao.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello. Hello.

Customer: Haan mam namaste.

Customer: Ah, maine aapko ek police adhikshak ko jo aavedan diya wo maine aapko pahuchaya kya?

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Aaj humne uske khilaf ek police thane mein FIR ke liye aavedan diya hai.

Executive: Haan ji aapne mujhe photo bhi bheji thi uski. Us us aavedan pe uska bhi number likha hai.

Customer: Saari prathmikta puri likhi hai uspe likhit document hai.

Executive: To ye jo number mujhe Aditya ne abhi bheja hai ye Aditya bol rahe hai ki koi IndiaMART ka hi hai jo ye sari cheeze janta hai jiske through ye baat hui thi.

Customer: Iske alawa hume kuch aur bhi number mile jo isi ki tarah aapke yaha fraud naam se registered hai.

Executive: Achha. Aur haan ab hume ye samajh mein nahi aa raha isme aap log isme kar kya rahe ho kya kar sakte ho hum sari jankari barabar de rahe hai. Uska number bhi diya uska account number bhi diya. Apna bhi hamara sab aapke paas hai lekin aage aage jab teen kaam karti hai na to koi bhi cheez itni jaldi ho nahi jati hai. Mai aapko koi fake promise bol dungi sir ek din mein kaam ho jayega to aisa to nahi hota hai.

Customer: Nahi koi baat nahi hum ek din mein nahi bol rahe agar koi baat nahi agar kuch ho gaya hai to usko hume ab tak kis hisab se account kaise hold kiya ja sakta hai kya kiya ja sakta hai iske bare mein kuch hume kaise pata lage?

Executive: Sir wo to jo aage se mere paas update aayega wahi update mai aapko de sakti hu abhi aage se koi update nahi aaya hai sir jaise jo baat hui thi wahi maine aapko bata di thi.

Customer: Nahi hume matlab aapke hume 24 ghante se jyada aapko matlab ye hoga iske beech mein koi koi isme sangyan liya hai kya?

Executive: Sir yaha na teen alag tarike se kaam karti hai ye police ka koi department aisa nahi hai ki police apne tarike se kaam karti hai IndiaMART apne tarike se kaam karta hai pehle. Nahi nahi hamara matlab ye hai mera matlab ye hai jaise man lo mai mai yaha pe apna wo leke aavedan leke gaya. Hmm. Aur maine apne police adhikshak ko aavedan diya usse paavti le liye. Is aur humne aapko share bhi ki. Aapki team ko jo bhi kaam kar rahi hai uske bare mein hum kuch jankari prapt kar sakte hai in hamara ye liya ya iske bare mein ye koi kaam kiya jo aap hume share kar paye humne isko kya ye kaam kiya hai. Kyunki abhi sirf hume sirf aapse baat chit ho rahi hai keval. Ji aap teen kaam kar rahi hai. Are team kaun si team kaam kar rahi hai jo vyakti is kaam ke liye legal jimmedari rakhta ho usse hamari abhi tak charcha nahi hui is mamle mein.

Executive: To sir uske liye aap legal team ko connect kar lo.

Customer: Nahi to mai madad kaise connect karu mujhe pata hi nahi hai kuch.

Executive: Dekhiye jis number pe aap baat kar rahe ho uska to koi matlab nahi hai jis 9696 customer care se aap baat kar rahe ho us usse aapka kuch nahi hota hai waha se aapki jo baat hai aapka jo case hai wo forward hoke. To hamara matlab ye hai hum aapse baat kar rahe hai hum aapse chahte hai ki aap hamara phone unko forward kar de mai unse baat kar lu.

Executive: Sir mai bhi to yahi chahti hu aap bhi bataiye na kabhi maine aapki call receive na kari ho ya aapko jawab na diya ho agar mujhe nahi pata hoga to mai nahi chahti hu but mai baar baar aapko. Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi hume aapse koi shikayat nahi hai mai ye chaah raha hu ki hum kis prakar kisko kisse hum baat kare hume aisa koi legal vyakti mile jo jimmedar ho is kaam ke liye hum ye kaam kar sakte hai hume aap usse baat karane mein sahyog kar do.

Executive: Haan mai legal team ko mai legal team ka contact dekhti hu agar aapka usse ho jata hai to better hai ki aapki direct baat ho jayegi. Kyunki agar to mai yahi to chahta hu hume aap hume aap unka koi aisa number de ya usse hamara call forward kar de ki wo vyakti ye keh paye haan iske liye mai jimmedar hu ye kehne mein to aa raha hai legal team lekin legal team ka koi banda hume samne nahi aaya.

Executive: Samne nahi aaya hai kyunki abhi meri maine aapko bola tha ki mai apni manager se bhi baat karaungi kyunki wo bhi abhi free nahi hai isliye nahi kara pa rahi hu mai. Aap bhi samajhiye mai aisa kuch nahi hai ki mai aapko fake promise kar rahi hu ki ho jayega ho jayega jo cheez hai mai aapko wahi bata rahi hu.

Customer: Dekhiye dekhiye madam meri meri meri samasya ye hai ki mere haath se 57270 rupaye haath se ja chuke hai aur hume chinta ye hai ki bhai kahi se koi ab tak koi hum charcha karne ki sthiti mein nahi aaye ki bhai koi sunega kaun agar wo busy hai to hum kaha jaye jo free mile aur hum usse baat kare. Kyunki humne aapke yaha already 35 aapke yaha humne 35000 rupaye invest jo kiya hai wo ek isi vishwas ke upar kiya hai ki hum yaha achha saaf suthra sundar vyavsay kar payenge imandari se vyavsay agar hamare sath yahi hota to ye bhai hume ye lag raha hai 60000 ka scam to ye ho gaya 35000 ka ye ho gaya jo humne yaha dal rakhe hai. 35000 bhi fraud log baithe hue hai to sab.

Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai sir aapke jaise bahut sare log mai aapko mai aapko sach bata raha hu abhi mujhe ye lag raha hai abhi ki hamare sath ye to 57000 plus 35000 ye ye 35000 ka bhi scam ho chuka hai jo humne dal di kyunki hamare paas koi koi samay nahi hai kisi ko agar aapke paas samay nahi hai koi vyakti sab busy hai to hum kiske paas jaye jisse hum apni baat keh paye. To agar aap paise deke bhi agar paisa dene ke baad bhi hum government hospital jaise line mil raha hai to hum hamara fayda kya hua?

Customer: Ye baat sahi hai hume lag raha hai hamare sath double scam ho gaya.

Executive: Sir double scam ki baat nahi hai aapke jaise yaha karodo log apna vyavsay karte hai IndiaMART pe aur ye cheeze in kitne ke sath ho jati hai.

Customer: Aapne to karodo ko keh diya hum aapko. Mai aapko nahi nahi sir mai aapko legal team se hi connect karati hu theek hai wahi aapko jawab de payegi fir kyunki jo mere paas hai mai wo aapko bol deti hu fir aap mujhe sari cheeze bol rahe ho to wo mujhe bhi nahi achha lag raha hai mai itni help kar rahi hu kyunki mere paas mere paas aapki jimmedari hai isliye kar rahi hu sir mera koi fayda ya nuksan nahi hai isme.

Customer: Are mai aapse ye kab keh raha hu aapke paas jimmedari hai lekin humne aapse aapke dwara wo jimmedari puri abhi ho nahi pa rahi aapke paas itna power nahi hai. Mai aapko galat nahi bata raha lekin aapke member nahi hu. To isliye to hum keh rahe hai jo member hai usse aap hamari charcha to kara agar unhe time nahi hai to hume aur cheez bata de na aur.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was defrauded through IndiaMART platform.

- Customer deposited money but received no material.

- Wants legal team to address the issue.

- Feels double scammed due to IndiaMART investment.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to send a mail.

- Executive will check for updates and revert.

- Executive will try to connect with the legal team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check legal team contact details.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, fraud, legal team, payment, scam
